author: thomreis
body:
#### PR description:

Skip the GPU unpacking of the rest of the block if a bad block is detected in one thread. This behaviour matches the one of the CPU unpacker.

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/42301 for continuity in case the 13_0_X rebase PR is merged.

#### PR validation:

No crashes with integrity errors observed in runs 367771, 368547, and 368724 in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/39568. Passes WF 12434.512
title: ECAL skip GPU unpacking of the rest of the block if a bad block is detected - 131x
